actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Foreign Relations.

official_title: A bill to authorize appropriations for the United States Information Agency
short_title: United States Information Agency Appropriations Authorization Act

summary.text: United States Information Agency Appropriations Authorization Act - Authorizes appropriations for the United States Information Agency for fiscal year 1975, to carry out international informational activities, programs, and other purposes authorized by law. Requires the Secretary of State to submit to the Congress annual reports of expenditures made and activities carried on under authority of this Act.

titles.title: United States Information Agency Appropriations Authorization Act
A bill to authorize appropriations for the United States Information Agency
